MessageLoopMainManager

It's a MessageReceiverEx which is always attached to the gMessageLoopMain.  We need it to perform different synchronization tasks with the message loop.  We need an object which is always in the thread to send messages to it.

Functions
EH_killed

It is called when a unit is killed.  It is called in the main thread, so it's perfectly synchronized with everything.

Parameters: "_objectHandle", "_killer", "_instigator", "_useEffects"

Parameters are same as https://​community​.bistudio​.com​/wiki​/Arma_3:_Event_Handlers​#Killed

Returns: nil

EH_GetIn

It is called when someone gets in a vehicle.  It is called in the main thread, so it's perfectly synchronized with everything.

Parameters: "_vehicle", "_role", "_unit", "_turret"

Parameters are same as https://​community​.bistudio​.com​/wiki​/Arma_3:_Event_Handlers​#GetIn

Returns: nil

deleteObject

Deletes object in this thread.

Returns: nil
